attributes.action: Change petitions so they can only be signed with a national insurance number.
attributes.additional_details: MPs are wasting time debating the tantrums of populists worldwide and not actually on the issues that matter to the UK.
attributes.background: The reason i am requesting this is that i dont see why people in North Korea or USA or anywhere else should have any sway over our petitions to MPs

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. It'c clear that you'd like people to be required to give a National Insurance number to sign a petition. However, at present, British citizens living abroad (who may also have NI numbers) can sign petitions. We're not sure whether or not you would like this to change. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
